p: The amino acid composition of protein samples were determined according to the method previously described by Du et al. [ 20]. Protein samples were hydrolyzed with 6 M HCl under a nitrogen atmosphere for 24 h at 110 °C, 20 μL of hydrolysate were loaded into an L-8800 automatic amino acid analyser (Hitachi). Amino acid compositions were expressed as g/100 g protein.
